string.value: #p2040052# heard the news that the tower of the Goddess was discovered while he was looking for the person who will listen to his requests...

#p2040052# said that he researched about Goddess Minerva when he was young and was crazy over her but nobody believed him at all and have been asked to look for data about the Goddess Minerva at the tower of the Goddess, shall I help?\n\n#t4161014# #b#c4161014##k/1

#p2040052# was very happy that the diary of the Goddess was donated to the library. We researched about Ossyria's past and said, wouldn't be of great help? While the book is at the library,book also must be happy that it will be read by many people.
Some time ago, I heard the news from Orbis that a new tower was discovered. If my guess is correct, that thing is obviously the tower of Goddess Minerva.\n#L0##b The tower of Goddess Minerva ?#k#l
Yes. The Goddess of wisdom and beauty that ruled the city of heaven, Orbis, made it clear that it was Minerva's tower. Traveler. If it is alright, will you listen to my request?

Thank you very much. When I was young, I researched about Goddess Minerva but could not find any evidence and thus suffered disregard by others. This is because no traces are left although it is said that Goddess Minerva built the tall goddess tower in the area near Orbis.

However, the tower discovered within the clouds is obviously the tower of Goddess Minerva Traveler. As you venture to the tower of Goddess, look for the record that Goddess Minerva left behind. It is said that Goddess Minerva liked to write in her diary just like humans, so if her diary can be found, it will be enough data to prove my research.
It is really such a pity. I cannot go because of my mission to protect the library. Tell me if you change your mind.
This is exactly the diary of Goddess Minerva that was mentioned only in legends! I thought it would only remain in my imagination.. I cannot believe that it is right in front of my eyes.
The Goddess' diary will be kept safely in the library in the future, as it will be important data for the research about the Maple World . Thank you very much.
It is said that Goddess Minerva said that she liked to write in her diary just like humans, so if her diary can be found, it will be enough data to prove my research.
